name: [ECHOSTASIS] Prologue
description:
WISHLIST ON [STEAM] HERE [ECHOSTASIS]
Prologue YOUR NEW WORLD AWAITS

"Introducing the latest experience from
THE ENIGMA© CORPORATION"

"The [ECHO] represents the next logical step in immersive entertainment and relaxation for our customers."

"LOSE YOURSELF in your very own reality, algorithmically generated from your cerebral profile."

STEP INSIDE YOUR CHAMBER
LET [HER] DO THE REST

Follow me on TWITTER.

If you enjoy this Prologue and wish to support the full game's
development, please consider supporting me on PATREON.
(I will send you compliments.)
